----- Testing values
0.75      - 0 01111110 10000000000000000000000 - correct
            C C      C 10000000000000000000000
----            
            
0.22      - 0 01111100 11000010100011110101110 - incorrect
            C C      I 11000010100011110101100
                                            !

0.88      - 0 01111110 11000010100011110101110 - correct
            C C      C 11000010100011110101110

0.9       - 0 01111110 11001100110011001100110 - correct
            C C      C 11001100110011001100110
0.9987    - 0 01111110 11111111010101011001101 - correct
            C C      C 11111111010101011001101
0.8       - 0 01111110 10011001100110011001100 - correct
            C C      C 10011001100110011001100

83488.99  - 0 10001111 01000110001000001111110 - correct            
            C C      C 01000110001000001111110

            C C      C 11000000000000000000000

            0 10000101 11111111111101011100001

            0 10000101 11111111000000000000000

                       11110011001100110011001
